patterns.component_structure: React functional components with TypeScript, using Material-UI components
patterns.provider_pattern: App wrapped in providers (ThemeProvider, ToastProvider) in main.tsx
patterns.state_management: React hooks (useState, useEffect) and local state

existing_implementations.description: No existing i18n implementation found. All strings are hardcoded in English throughout the application.
key_insights: Sidebar has 15+ hardcoded navigation labels in English
Three navigation sections: main (Dashboard, Projects), project-specific (Equipment, Materials, etc.), and system (Audit Log, Settings)
Section header 'Current Project' also needs translation
Backend has bilingual support (name/name_he fields) but frontend lacks i18n
Provider pattern already established in main.tsx for easy i18n integration
